attributes.action: Revoke csa if the mother is removing the child from the father aggainst his will
attributes.background: A lot of fathers have never met their son/daughter yet are having to pay for the mother to look after them, most of them fathers are not even a named parent on the birth certificate yet still have to fund for the mother who stopping the father seeing them without good cause

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure in what circumstances you would like child support payments to no longer be payable.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly the circumstances in which you would like it not to be payable.
